results.title: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor inhibits dehydration-enhanced fever induced by endotoxin in rats.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Regul Integr Comp Physiol
results.text_hl: Under dehydrated conditions, the enhanced endotoxin-induced @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ was significantly inhibited by the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, but the @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL-1beta@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ was not.

citations.NLM: Watanabe T, Hashimoto M, Wada M, Imoto T, Miyoshi M, Sadamitsu D, Maekawa T. Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor inhibits dehydration-enhanced fever induced by endotoxin in rats. Am J Physiol Regul Integr Comp Physiol. 2000 Oct;279(4):R1512-6. PMID: 11004022

results.title: Atypical Presentation of IgA Nephropathy Mimicking Acute Pyelonephritis
results.text_hl: Furthermore, both urine and blood cultures came back negative, and no @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ was recorded during the hospital stay.
